thread.title: Blessed in the Mess: How to Experience God’s Goodness in the Midst of Life’s Pain by Joyce Meyer

author: Bryson Stohr
title: Blessed in the Mess: How to Experience God’s Goodness in the Midst of Life’s Pain by Joyce Meyer
text: Blessed in the Mess: How to Experience God’s Goodness in the Midst of Life’s Pain by Joyce Meyer Contributed by Bryson Stohr on Jun 2nd, 2024. Artwork published in 2022. Source: www.amazon.com License: All Rights Reserved. The cover artwork for Joyce Meyer’s Blessed in the Mess: How to Experience God’s Goodness in the Midst of Life’s Pain, which is a book about finding peace and blessing amongst life’s hardships. The title of the book is set in Lydia, Colophon’s digital revival of Lydian’s bold condensed style. The secondary typeface is Brandon Grotesque.
